price:
146. Kuwa heysta (diinta) Yuhuudi-  
 yadda waxaan ka xarrimnay (neef) kasta oo ciddi leh10, xagga lo'da iyo adhiga waxaan ka xarrimnay buruurtooda wax Maahee ku dhegay dhabarradooda ama xiidmahooda ama ku dheehmay laf. Sidaas waxay ahayd ciqaab aan ku abaal marinnay dulmigoodii dartiis, run baana sheegaynaa.
arabic: وَعَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُواْ حَرَّمۡنَا كُلَّ ذِي ظُفُرٖۖ وَمِنَ ٱلۡبَقَرِ وَٱلۡغَنَمِ حَرَّمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ شُحُومَهُمَآ إِلَّا مَا حَمَلَتۡ ظُهُورُهُمَآ أَوِ ٱلۡحَوَايَآ أَوۡ مَا ٱخۡتَلَطَ بِعَظۡمٖۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِبَغۡيِهِمۡۖ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ
footnotes: 10. Xoolihii ciddi leh: Waxaa loola jeedaa xoolaha aanay ciddayahooda kala tagsaneyn sida geela, iwm. Qaar kale waxay yidhaahdeen: waxaa loola jeedaa xoolaha leh hal ciddi oo keliya, sida faraska, dameerka, iwm.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waʿalā alladhīna hādū ḥarramnā kulla dhī ẓufurin wamina al-baqari wal-ghanami ḥarramnā ʿalayhim shuḥūmahumā illā mā ḥamalat ẓuhūruhumā awi al-ḥawāyā aw mā ikh'talaṭa biʿaẓmin dhālika jazaynāhum bibaghyihim wa-innā laṣādiqūna
